bands.name: Metallica
bands.description: One of the most influential thrash metal bands, known for their complex song structures and aggressive sound.
bands.styleNotes: Evolved from pure thrash to more progressive and alternative styles in the 1990s and 2000s.

bands.name: Anthrax
bands.description: One of the "Big Four" thrash bands, known for incorporating rap and punk elements.
bands.styleNotes: Experimented with different styles including rap-metal crossover.

bands.name: Kreator
bands.description: German thrash metal pioneers known for extreme aggression.
bands.styleNotes: Influenced death metal development with their extreme sound.

bands.name: Sodom
bands.description: German thrash metal band known for raw, aggressive sound.
bands.styleNotes: Maintained consistent extreme thrash style.

bands.name: Destruction
bands.description: German thrash metal band part of the "Teutonic Thrash" scene.
bands.styleNotes: Known for aggressive vocals and fast riffing.

bands.name: Dark Angel
bands.description: American thrash metal band known for extreme speed and complexity.
bands.styleNotes: Pioneered technical thrash metal.

bands.name: Vio-lence
bands.description: Bay Area thrash band known for technical riffs.
bands.styleNotes: Part of the second wave of Bay Area thrash.

bands.name: Death Angel
bands.description: Bay Area thrash band with diverse influences.
bands.styleNotes: Incorporated funk and experimental elements.

bands.name: Flotsam and Jetsam
bands.description: American thrash band with progressive tendencies.
bands.styleNotes: Known for complex song structures.

bands.name: Rage
bands.description: German metal band blending thrash and power metal.
bands.styleNotes: Evolved to incorporate symphonic elements.

bands.name: Running Wild
bands.description: German metal band known for pirate themes.
bands.styleNotes: Combined thrash and power metal with pirate imagery.

bands.name: Grave Digger
bands.description: German metal band with dark themes.
bands.styleNotes: Evolved from speed metal to power metal.

bands.name: Hallows Eve
bands.styleNotes: Known for dark, atmospheric thrash.

bands.name: Lazarus
bands.styleNotes: Technical thrash metal.

bands.styleNotes: Fast, aggressive speed/thrash metal.

bands.name: Exciter
bands.styleNotes: Influenced thrash metal development with fast, aggressive songs.

bands.name: Annihilator

bands.styleNotes: Technical thrash with complex riffing.

bands.name: Vektor
bands.styleNotes: Highly technical thrash with progressive and sci-fi themes.

bands.name: Revocation
bands.styleNotes: Blends technical death metal with thrash.

bands.name: Tankard
bands.description: German thrash band known for drinking themes.
bands.styleNotes: Fun, party-oriented thrash metal.

bands.name: Whiplash

bands.styleNotes: Fast, aggressive East Coast thrash.

bands.name: Artillery
bands.styleNotes: Technical thrash with progressive elements.

bands.name: Mercyful Fate
bands.description: Danish heavy/thrash band with occult themes.
bands.styleNotes: Influenced black metal with their occult imagery.

bands.name: Death
bands.description: Pioneering death metal band founded by Chuck Schuldiner, evolved to incorporate progressive elements.
bands.styleNotes: Started as raw death metal, evolved to highly technical and progressive death metal.

bands.name: Cannibal Corpse
bands.description: Known for extreme brutality and controversial lyrics.
bands.styleNotes: Consistent brutal death metal style throughout their career.

bands.name: Morbid Angel
bands.description: Pioneering death metal band known for technical complexity and dark themes.
bands.styleNotes: Incorporated industrial and electronic elements in later albums.

bands.name: Obituary
bands.description: Known for their slow, heavy sound and growling vocals.
bands.styleNotes: Consistent death/doom style with signature growling vocals.

bands.name: Deicide

bands.styleNotes: Consistent brutal death metal with anti-religious themes.

bands.name: Suffocation
bands.description: Pioneers of brutal death metal with slam elements.
bands.styleNotes: Created the slam death metal subgenre.
